profile.summary: Tenured and process driven Product Manager leading AI, SaaS, and enterprise platform development bridging structured and unstructured data into actionable insights. Proven success delivering AI-driven data products, backend integrations, and real-time analytics dashboards for global clients. Strong foundation in telecom, infrastructure, and API architecture, coupled with hands-on experience in LLM integration, contextual automation, and performance optimization. Known for execution excellence, cross-functional leadership, and transforming complex technical requirements into scalable solutions.

achievements.content_html:
• Awarded Employee of the Year 2021
  • Certified Public Accountant (CPA)

projects.title: Financial Dashboard
projects.description: A dashboard to visualize personal expenses using Python.
